text: Bronxville is a village in Westchester County, New York, located about north of midtown Manhattan.Bronxville, NY to Manhattan, NY . Retrieved 2010-03-20 It is part of the town of Eastchester. As of the 2020 U.S. census, Bronxville had a population of 6,656. ==References== Category:Villages in New York (state)
title: Bronxville, New York
